title: Authors and Citation
text: Sund R (2022). ducker: Extended R Interface 'DuckDB'. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://github.com/rsund/ducker.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ducker: Extended R Interface for 'DuckDB'},   author = {Reijo Sund},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://github.com/rsund/ducker}, }

title: Extended R Interface for DuckDB
text: goal ducker provide selection helper functions ease use DuckDB database management system R.

title: Extended R Interface for DuckDB
text: can install development version ducker R-universe :
code: # Enable universe(s) by rsund options(repos = c(   rsund = 'https://rsund.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org',   options()$repos))  # Install the package install.packages('ducker')
